title: AIPlayMaker
description: AIPlayMaker is a versatile board game AI service, capable of determining the best next moves for various board games. The service integrates algorithms such as Minimax and Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) for games like Tic Tac Toe and Connect Four respectively. Future updates include the integration of Machine Learning models to provide more competitive gameplay across a wider array of board games. It offers a simple RESTful API to interact with, allowing it to be integrated into any application.

title: C.A.D.E. - Comprehensive Automated Digital E-butler
description: CADE is a comprehensive backend service designed to manage contact form messages for this web portfolio. The application employs Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to receive and store messages securely. It follows industry-standard production-level practices, including comprehensive testing with Jest, error handling, logging with Winston, and Continuous Integration via GitHub Actions.

title: Nootfolio
description: Welcome to my meticulously crafted web portfolio. I've focused on balancing high interactivity with optimal loading time, providing a seamless, engaging user experience without compromise on performance. Dive into the different sections where I showcase my skills and projects, and feel free to connect with me through the dedicated contact form. This portfolio reflects my dedication to blending functionality with aesthetics in web development, a characteristic I bring to all my projects.
